text: int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; else return b ; } int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int i , j ; int m , sum , final ; int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & sum ) ; while ( sum -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = n - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] [ j ] < a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] + a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; else a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ i ] [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
